[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/express](./express.md) &gt; [MIDDLEWARE\_INTERCEPTOR\_NAMESPACE](./express.middleware_interceptor_namespace.md)

## MIDDLEWARE\_INTERCEPTOR\_NAMESPACE variable

Default namespace for Express middleware based local interceptors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MIDDLEWARE_INTERCEPTOR_NAMESPACE = "globalInterceptors.middleware"
```
